attributes.action: Build temporary hospitals to help combat the coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Temporary hospitals should be built in areas where the risk of contacting the virus are high such as in London.
attributes.background: Money should be funded by the government in order to help build temporary hospitals for people who have contracted the coronavirus. This will help isolate the infected and decrease the risk of the virus from spreading to other patients.

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, a number of temporary hospitals have been set up, including in London.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
